holidays.title: National New Friends Day
holidays.description: Make room for new connections in your life, and celebrate friendship everywhere you go.

holidays.title: Day of Unity
holidays.description: This is the signature event of National Bullying Prevention Month.

holidays.title: Evaluate Your Life Day
holidays.description: This day encourages us to reflect on our lives to become better versions of ourselves.

holidays.title: Geelong Cup Day
holidays.description: The day of the running of the Geelong Cup — a Group 3 thoroughbred horse race.

holidays.title: Hagfish Day
holidays.description: Today, we learn that, although not cuties, these creatures play an important role in nature.

holidays.title: LGBT Center Awareness Day
holidays.description: Get ready to learn about the importance of L.G.B.T.Q centers in your community!

holidays.title: National BRA Day
holidays.description: Together, let’s honor the strong women fighting breast cancer and help them make informed decisions.

holidays.title: National Council Hill Day
holidays.description: Healthcare advocates can directly request funds for mental health programs from their policymakers.

holidays.title: National Jared Day
holidays.description: How many famous people named Jared can you think of? We know of at least 10!

holidays.title: National Kentucky Day
holidays.description: Kentucky is all about horses, food, coal, culture, and astounding historic landmarks.

holidays.title: National Medical Assistants Day
holidays.description: A great time to explore this important, fast-growing career.

holidays.title: National Seafood Bisque Day
holidays.description: Get out your spoon as we dig into all the fun facts about this special day.

holidays.title: Ride To Work Day
holidays.description: Prepare your bicycles and helmets for a ride to work to help you get in shape!

holidays.title: Support Your Local Chamber of Commerce Day
holidays.description: Don’t forget to thank your local chambers of commerce for their contribution to sustaining the economy!

holidays.title: World Humanitarian Action Day
holidays.description: Let us honor and respect the humanitarian martyrs who died while protecting others!

holidays.title: World Pediatric Bone and Joint Day
holidays.description: World Pediatric Bone and Joint Day highlights obesity, screening, and prevention.

holidays.title: Angel Brinks’s Birthday
holidays.description: She took plain leggings and turned them into something enticing, earning the title "Queen of Leggings."

holidays.title: Arzaylea’s Birthday
holidays.description: It doesn’t look like she’s slowed down, ever since her stardom on Instagram.

holidays.title: Candice Pool’s Birthday
holidays.description: This jewelry designer has a distinct vision and the talent to make it a reality!

holidays.title: Cari Roblox’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented YouTube star and actor is known for her expressive voice and fun content.

holidays.title: Dorinda Clark-Cole’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented musician has taken us through a journey of a lifetime.

holidays.title: Evander Holyfield’s Birthday
holidays.description: Holyfield was indeed ‘The Real Deal’ of boxing, determined to be the best.

holidays.title: HappyBirthdayCalvin’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young rapper is starting to receive international acclaim, and it's exciting to see!

holidays.title: Jeon Hee-Jin’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young achiever has a dream, and she’s working hard to attain it.

holidays.title: Lil Durk’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented rapper stays working, stays busy, and is always motivated to keep going!

holidays.title: Mohammed Tarek’s Birthday
holidays.description: Mohammed Tarek is only just getting started on his ventures, and his future is looking bright!

holidays.title: Peter Tosh’s Birthday
holidays.description: Peter Tosh was posthumously granted Jamaica's third highest decoration, the Order of Merit.

holidays.title: Sam Pottorff’s Birthday
holidays.description: An influencer like no other, let’s celebrate his special day today right here!

holidays.title: Sean Price’s Birthday
holidays.description: Sean Price was one of the greatest rappers and he left behind a rich musical legacy.
